last_episode_to_air.name: The Vows
last_episode_to_air.overview: To mark their 10-year wedding anniversary, Oliver and Kelli are renewing their vows at the Durnin residence, but Oliver is worried about saying his vows. Gil and Jan are bitter that Louis and Ricky excluded them at their country club during their kids' wedding. Dani and Blake start dating again. And Claire pesters Shawni about the time she and Jason slept together.

name: Your Family or Mine
overview: Oliver and Kelli are living proof of the old saying, "When you marry someone, you don't just marry them, you marry their whole family."
tagline: We love our family more than anything. Just not when we're all together.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Oliver installs a nanny-cam at his home so he can keep an eye on the babysitter while he takes Kelli for a night out. But when the babysitter has a visitor, suddenly it's Louis and Jason who are glued to the screen. Meanwhile, Ricky thinks Kelli is abusing her children after she sees a drawing her granddaughter made.

episodes.name: The Durnins
episodes.overview: It's Dani's birthday, and everyone thinks Oliver is going to ruin it because he always ruins birthdays. Kelli buys Dani a psychic visit as a present. And Shawni becomes convinced she's adopted.

episodes.name: The Couch
episodes.overview: Ricky plans on throwing out Oliver's childhood couch, but both he and Jason are ready to fight for it. Claire panics when Louis brings home a piece of art that features her in the nude.

episodes.name: The Will
episodes.overview: Gil's aunt dies, but nobody liked her until they find out she was leaving behind a potential fortune in her will. Oliver and Kelli scramble to find a way out when Shawni asks them to be her horrible son's guardians.

episodes.name: Christmas in July
episodes.overview: It's Ricky's annual summer Christmas photo, but Louis scheduled his company-mandated life insurance physical at the same time, and a representative will be dropping by to take a urine sample. Since Louis smoked pot with Blake last week, he's now on the hunt for an untainted sample.

episodes.name: The Speech
episodes.overview: Gil is up for an award at his college, but after Jan and Kelli find out he's not going to win, they try to stop him from going. Dani comes home super high from a wild night. And Shawni wants Enzo to propose.

episodes.name: 5 Stages
episodes.overview: The Weston family members experience individual traumas as they go through the five stages of grief: denial, anger, bargaining, depression and acceptance.

episodes.name: The Pantry
episodes.overview: Oliver finds Blake and Dani naked and has to get them of the house before anyone finds out. Shawni takes Kelli's old jean jacket and won't give it back. And Enzo helps Gil craft a letter to the "permit fascists" at the farmer's market.

episodes.name: Presents
episodes.overview: Jason tells Kelli he got a drunken vasectomy, but Claire has some shocking news of her own. Blake brings a girl home by pretending he's an Australian pop star. And Ricky and Louis celebrate their anniversary.

episodes.name: The Vows
episodes.overview: To mark their 10-year wedding anniversary, Oliver and Kelli are renewing their vows at the Durnin residence, but Oliver is worried about saying his vows. Gil and Jan are bitter that Louis and Ricky excluded them at their country club during their kids' wedding. Dani and Blake start dating again. And Claire pesters Shawni about the time she and Jason slept together.
